description: Erection of a single storey rear extension following the demolition of existing ground floor rear back addition; erection of a single storey extension to the side of the main building and to the side of ground floor rear back addition; excavation of part of the rear garden to form a lightwell in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement; replacement of the main roof covering with new roof covering and replacement of 2no existing windows with new triple glazed timber framed windows at second floor level to the front elevation; alterations to the roof of ground floor back addition; installation of 1no new window at first floor level and 2no new windows at ground floor level to the side (eastern) elevation; demolition and re-building of the side (western) elevation boundary wall in between no. 2 and 3 Ravenscourt Place; associated landscaping in the rear garden comprising of permeable paving to replace impermeable concrete/paved surface to rear garden.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
